text: Amasia uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko ghua Idomia mɨsozir dughiamɨn, Israelian mɨdorozir gumazir Amasia uam amangiziba, me uamategha iza Judan nguibar ekiabav sosi, me Samarian nguibar ekiamɨn ikegha ghua, Bethoronɨn nguibar ekiamɨn tu. Egha me 3,000plan gumazamizibav soghezɨ me ariaghirezɨ, me nguibar ekiar kabar itir bizir aghuir bar avɨriba inigha ghue.
